name: Andrew Woodward
what_you_do: Andrew Woodward teaches smarter money management and investment strategies to help individuals achieve financial freedom, offering free resources, online courses, and coaching services.
who_you_serve: Individuals seeking financial education and investment skills to improve their financial outcomes and achieve a financially free lifestyle.
bio: Chartered Accountant, Chartered Company Secretary, and Director with over 25 years in finance roles, including CEO.
business_focus: Andrew Woodward teaches smarter money management and investment strategies to help individuals achieve financial freedom, offering free resources, online courses, and coaching services. (financial education)
